  "content": "public class Test extends ParentClass implements TestInterface, AnotherInterface {\n    // Private field\n    private int value;\n\n    // Static field\n    public static int staticValue = 10;\n\n    // Final field\n    private final String finalField;\n\n    // Inner class (nested class)\n    public class InnerClass {\n        public void innerMethod() {\n            System.out.println(\"Inner class method, value: \" + value);\n        }\n    }\n\n    // Static inner class\n    public static class StaticNestedClass {\n        public void nestedMethod() {\n            System.out.println(\"Static nested class method\");\n        }\n    }\n\n    // Constructor\n    public Test(int value) {\n        this.value = value;\n        this.finalField = \"Cannot be changed\";\n    }\n\n    // Overloaded constructor\n    public Test() {\n        this(0);\n    }\n\n    // Public method\n    public String getValue() {\n        return \"Value: \" + value;\n    }\n",
  "content_length": 916

  "content": "    public boolean authenticateUser(String username, String password) {\n        if (username == null || username.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: Username is null or empty\");\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        if (password == null || password.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: Password is null or empty\");\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        System.out.println(\"Authenticating user: \" + username);\n\n        // ダミーの認証处理\n        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {\n            System.out.println(\"Authentication step \" + i);\n            if (i == 5) {\n                System.out.println(\"Validating credentials...\");\n            }\n        }\n\n        boolean isValid = username.length() > 3 && password.length() > 6;\n\n        if (isValid) {\n            validatedUsers.add(username);\n            System.out.println(\"User \" + username + \" authenticated successfully\");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println(\"Authentication failed for user: \" + username);\n        }\n\n        return isValid;\n    }\n",
  "content_length": 1051
}"
